mapper.select: select max(substr(itm_his_num,-3)) from item_history where to_char(itm_his_rdy,'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_char(#{itmHisRdy},'yyyy-MM-dd')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( select itm_stc_num as lot_num ,itm_code ,itm_vol from item_stock where itm_code = #{itmCode} and
itm_vol>0
ORDER BY itm_stc_num
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 10 )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( select ord_num ,to_char(ord_request_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as ord_request_date ,to_char(ord_delivery_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as ord_delivery_date ,oper_name ,oper_code from order_m where ord_num in(select ord_num from order_d where ord_status='진행')
and ord_num < #{ordNum1}
and
ord_request_date >= to_date(#{ordBDate} ,'yyyy-MM-dd') and ord_request_date <= to_date(#{ordADate} ,'yyyy-MM-dd')
ORD_DELIVERY_DATE >= to_date(#{ordBDate} ,'yyyy-MM-dd') and ORD_DELIVERY_DATE <= to_date(#{ordADate} ,'yyyy-MM-dd')
ORDER BY ord_num desc
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 10 )

select ih.itm_his_num from item_history_d ihd , item_history ih ,( select max(itm_his_d_num) as itm_his_d_num from item_history ih , item_history_d ihd where ord_num = #{ordNum} and ih.itm_his_num = ihd.itm_his_num) a where ihd.itm_his_num = ih.itm_his_num and a.itm_his_d_num = ihd.itm_his_d_num
